ValidationRule.description: Used in General Approval Form to make either of the Serial or Parallel checkbox mandatory
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(AND(Serial__c = TRUE, Parallel__c = TRUE,Workflow__c = 'General Approval Form'),AND( ISCHANGED(Serial__c) ,Serial__c = FALSE, Parallel__c = FALSE))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Either Serial or Parallel must be checked
